Language Packs: In order to ensure the translation Magento coverage, please see the information in the lower paragraphs!
Paquet de langue: Afin d'assurer la couverture de la traduction Magento, s'il vous plaît voir les informations dans les paragraphes plus bas!

Language Packs: To install the translation for the Magento Connect Manager, proceed as follows:
Paquet de langue: To install the translation for the Magento Connect Manager, proceed as follows:

Language Packs: In your Magento root directory in the subfolder "%s" rename the folder "%s" into "%s".
Paquet de langue: In your Magento root directory in the subfolder "%s" rename the folder "%s" into "%s".

Language Packs: The Magento Connect Manager should be changed to Spanish now.
Paquet de langue: La Magento Connect Manager doit maintenant être changé en Espagne.

Language Packs: If Magento is updated, in particular the module "Mage_Downloader", the settings of the Connect Manager will be overwritten!
Paquet de langue: If Magento is updated, in particular the module "Mage_Downloader", the settings of the Connect Manager will be overwritten!

Language Packs: The same applies to the TinyMCE editor. Run in the case a "Reinstall" the language pack and repeat the described steps.
Paquet de langue: The same applies to the TinyMCE editor. Run in the case a "Reinstall" the language pack and repeat the described steps.

Language Packs: The installed language pack only provides translations of in Magento existing texts. If you want to prepare your Magento store on the legal requirements in %s or expand common payment methods, we recommend to install the following additional extensions.
Paquet de langue: Le pack de langue installée seulement fournit des traductions de textes existants dans Magento. Si vous voulez préparer votre boutique Magento sur les exigences juridiques en %s ou développer des modes de paiement, nous vous recommandons d'installer les extensions suivantes.
les magasins chiliens et d'Amérique latine
les magasins colombiens et d'Amérique latine
les magasins mexicains et d'Amérique latine

Language Packs: Use Spanish language for TinyMCE Editor?
